answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
In Virginia Beach each department is responsible for creating its own dress code appropriate to the work done.  I am attaching the dress code from the Human Services Department.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Sunnyvale, CA would like copies of your Dress Codes.  Please send to:
Doug Baker  
Principal HR Analyst   
Employee Relations/Employee Development  
City of Sunnyvale  
HR Department  
408-730-2705  
dbaker@ci.sunnyvale.ca.us  
Thank you!
title: Dress Code Policies
